key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks due to past UDAP violations and ongoing oversight
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities highlighted by the recent third-party vendor data breach
Economic sensitivity to regional downturns in agriculture and manufacturing
Competitive pressures from larger national banks and fintech companies
controversies: 2018 consent order for UDAP violations, resulting in $4.75 million in restitution
2023 data breach involving a third-party vendor using the MOVEit file-transfer application
social_issues: Mixed customer satisfaction and service quality concerns
Potential erosion of customer trust due to data breach and regulatory issues
governance_issues: Weaknesses in compliance and consumer protection practices
Challenges in managing third-party vendor risks
